agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 10:00 AM, Monday, March 4, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 114 White Relating to providing public high school students information regarding the availability of college credit awarded for military experience, education, and training obtained during military service. HB 303 Paul Relating to entities eligible to authorize the creation of a spaceport development corporation. HB 390 Blanco Relating to defense economic readjustment zones. HB 1000 Paddie Relating to rural and opportunity funds and insurance tax credits for certain investments in those funds; imposing a monetary penalty; authorizing fees. HB 1402 Walle Relating to the purposes of and income eligibility limits for participation in programs offered by the Texas State Affordable Housing Corporation. HR 23 Miller Expressing support for the strengthening of our partnership with Taiwan and for the expansion of Taiwan's role on the global stage. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
